column3:
@stratospher 

The "include-what-you-use" policy is used in Bitcoin Core. See the "Source code organization" section in the [developer notes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md):

- Every `.cpp` and `.h` file should `#include` every header file it directly uses classes, functions or other
  definitions from, even if those headers are already included in
Thanks for clarifying! Closing this PR.
